channel.title: Sites Insane Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: my friend.. this is the end..
item.description: woah. I wish I was good at flash!i would probably end up a stoner. ;)friendster still is growing in popularity. it is insane. I wish one of my projects did this well. it is finally getting some press as well.
